func:
msg.url = `http://localhost:8080/test/?id=${msg.payload.id}`; // Dynamically set the URL
return msg;

format:
<script>
(function(scope) {
    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        if (msg && msg.payload) {
            var selectedRowId = msg.payload.id;

            // Clear previously highlighted rows
            var tableRows = document.querySelectorAll(".tabulator-row");
            tableRows.forEach(row => {
                row.style.backgroundColor = "";
            });

            // Highlight the selected row based on ID
            var selectedRow = Array.from(tableRows).find(row => {
                return row.querySelector(".tabulator-cell[tabulator-field='id']").innerText.trim() === String(selectedRowId);
            });

            if (selectedRow) {
                selectedRow.style.backgroundColor = "#98fb98";
            }
        }
    });
})(scope);
</script>

<style>
/* Optional: Add any custom styling for the table */
.tabulator-row {
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
}
</style>
